response.original_title: King Tut and Other Famous Egyptian Mummies
response.overview: Learn all about King Tut and other famous mummies of ancient Egypt. Who was King Tut and how was he discovered relatively "recently"? Who were Ramses II and Hatshepsut? Why was the afterlife so important to the ancient Egyptians? How did the Egyptians make a mummy? Is there really a mummy curse? The answers to all of these questions and more are covered in depth with detailed graphics and exciting video. On-screen, multiple-choice reviews at the end of each segment reinforce important concepts and make learning fun.
response.title: King Tut and Other Famous Egyptian Mummies
